query:
SELECT a.id, a.phoneNumber, a.status, a.createdAt, COUNT(sm.id) as sms_count
FROM activations a
LEFT JOIN sms_messages sm ON sm.activationId = a.id
WHERE a.userId = 90007
GROUP BY a.id
ORDER BY a.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 5;

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 35dchGD4KrPJFby.root --database 2KeMNLvGvAyUJv9AEWkrsw --execute SELECT a.id, a.phoneNumber, a.status, a.createdAt, COUNT(sm.id) as sms_count
FROM activations a
LEFT JOIN sms_messages sm ON sm.activationId = a.id

ORDER BY a.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 5;
